identified-content.org: Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys (Music Group)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

abstract.p: Southern California's Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys is set to release its fourth album and perform at Maxwell's in Hoboken, NJ (S)

block.p: Swing and hillbilly boogie meet in the performances of Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys, a Southern California group that visits the East Coast frequently and is set to release its fourth album, ''Night Tide,'' in August on High Tone Records.

Roots-rock and rhythm-and-blues influences can also be heard in the group's unusual, sometimes upbeat, sometimes sultry sound that weaves back and forth between jumping jive to blues mourning. After more than a decade on the road and in the studio, Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys were joined last year by Jeff West on upright bass and bass fiddle, adding a country twang to the rock and swing sound.

Swing and hillbilly boogie meet in the performances of Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys, a Southern California group that visits the East Coast frequently and is set to release its fourth album, ''Night Tide,'' in August on High Tone Records.

Roots-rock and rhythm-and-blues influences can also be heard in the group's unusual, sometimes upbeat, sometimes sultry sound that weaves back and forth between jumping jive to blues mourning. After more than a decade on the road and in the studio, Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys were joined last year by Jeff West on upright bass and bass fiddle, adding a country twang to the rock and swing sound.
In addition to their collaborative work, Big Sandy released a solo tribute to doo-wop, ''Dedicated to You,'' and the band put together its own album, ''Big Sandy Presents the Fly-Rite Boys.''
Big Sandy and the Fly-Rite Boys will perform at Maxwell's in Hoboken on Thursday.
